existing_features.title: Add frontend hooks for Razorpay payment flow. Create a `useRazorpayPayment` hook that calls `createRazorpayOrder` on the backend, loads the Razorpay checkout script (https://checkout.razorpay.com/v1/checkout.js) dynamically, opens the Razorpay payment modal with the order details, and on success calls `verifyRazorpayPayment` to confirm and activate the subscription. Handle payment failure and modal dismissal with appropriate error states.

Update the SubscriptionPage (frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx) to include a Razorpay payment option alongside the existing Stripe option. Each plan card (weekly, monthly, half-yearly) should show a 'Pay with Razorpay' button that triggers the Razorpay checkout flow using the useRazorpayPayment hook. Display the amount in INR. After successful payment, redirect the user to the dashboard with a success toast.

Update the PaymentTransactionTable (frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentTransactionTable.tsx) to display Razorpay as a payment method option in the filter dropdown and show a Razorpay badge/indicator for transactions made via Razorpay, consistent with the existing Stripe and PhonePe method indicators.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Razorpay payment option for subscriptions to directly receive payments (live key: rzp_live_SKEU5q1dCtfMpg)

Add Razorpay as a payment method in the backend. Store the Razorpay live key (rzp_live_SKEU5q1dCtfMpg) in the backend actor configuration. Add a new backend function `createRazorpayOrder` that accepts a subscription plan type and amount, creates a Razorpay order via HTTP outcall to the Razorpay Orders API (https://api.razorpay.com/v1/orders), and returns the order ID and amount. Add a `verifyRazorpayPayment` function that accepts razorpay_order_id, razorpay_payment_id, and razorpay_signature, verifies the payment signature, records the payment transaction, and activates the user's subscription.
